traits.name: Amphibious
traits.desc: The river troll can breathe both air and water.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The river troll has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Poison Skin
traits.desc: The river troll’s skin contains a powerful poison. Any time the troll touches another creature, the creature takes 7 (2d6) poison damage (included in attacks).

traits.name: Regeneration
traits.desc: The river troll regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn as long as it is at least partially submerged in water; strong rainfall also allows the troll’s regeneration to function. If the troll takes acid or lightning damage, this trait doesn’t function at the start of the troll’s next turn. The troll only dies if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn’t regenerate.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The river troll makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
